00030 #import "GHUINavigationController+PopDelegate.h"
00031 #import "GHNSObject+Swizzle.h"
00032 
00033 @implementation UINavigationController (GHPopDelegate)
00034 
00035 - (NSArray *)_popToRootViewControllerAnimated:(BOOL)animated {
00036   NSMutableArray *willPopControllers = [[self.viewControllers mutableCopy] autorelease];
00037   [willPopControllers removeObject:[self.viewControllers objectAtIndex:0]];
00038   
00039   if ([self.delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(navigationController:willPopViewControllers:animated:)]) {
00040     [((id)self.delegate) navigationController:self willPopViewControllers:willPopControllers animated:animated];
00041   }
00042   
00043   // Call original  
00044   NSArray *poppedViewControllers = [self _popToRootViewControllerAnimated:animated];
00045   
00046   if ([self.delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(navigationController:didPopViewControllers:animated:)]) {
00047     [((id)self.delegate) navigationController:self didPopViewControllers:poppedViewControllers animated:animated];
00048   }
00049   return poppedViewControllers;
00050 }
00051 
00052 - (NSArray *)_popToViewController:(UIViewController *)viewController animated:(BOOL)animated {
00053   NSUInteger index = [self.viewControllers indexOfObject:viewController];
00054   if (index != NSNotFound && index < ([self.viewControllers count] - 1)) {  
00055     NSArray *willPopControllers = [self.viewControllers subarrayWithRange:NSMakeRange(index + 1, ([self.viewControllers count] - index))];
00056   
00057     if ([self.delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(navigationController:willPopViewControllers:animated:)]) {
00058       [((id)self.delegate) navigationController:self willPopViewControllers:willPopControllers animated:animated];
00059     }
00060   }
00061   
00062   // Call original
00063   NSArray *poppedViewControllers = [self _popToViewController:viewController animated:animated];
00064   
00065   if ([self.delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(navigationController:didPopViewController:animated:)]) {
00066     [((id)self.delegate) navigationController:self didPopViewControllers:poppedViewControllers animated:animated];
00067   }
00068   return poppedViewControllers;
00069 }
00070 
00071 - (UIViewController *)_popViewControllerAnimated:(BOOL)animated {
00072   
00073   UIViewController *willPopController = self.topViewController;
00074   if ([self.delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(navigationController:willPopViewControllers:animated:)]) {
00075     [((id)self.delegate) navigationController:self willPopViewControllers:[NSArray arrayWithObject:willPopController] animated:animated];
00076   }
00077   
00078   // Call original  
00079   UIViewController *viewController = [self _popViewControllerAnimated:animated];
00080   NSAssert(willPopController == viewController, @"What we popped wasn't what was sent to willPop delegate");
00081   
00082   if ([self.delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(navigationController:didPopViewControllers:animated:)]) {
00083     [((id)self.delegate) navigationController:self didPopViewControllers:[NSArray arrayWithObject:viewController] animated:animated];
00084   }
00085   return viewController;
00086 }
00087 
00088 + (void)addPopDelegate {
00089   [UINavigationController gh_swizzleMethod:@selector(popToRootViewControllerAnimated:) withMethod:@selector(_popToRootViewControllerAnimated:)];
00090   [UINavigationController gh_swizzleMethod:@selector(popToViewController:animated:) withMethod:@selector(_popToViewController:animated:)];
00091   [UINavigationController gh_swizzleMethod:@selector(popViewControllerAnimated:) withMethod:@selector(_popViewControllerAnimated:)];  
00092 }
00093 
00094 @end
